GetAbsoluteInterval(RelativeInterval)

Given a relative interval, return all absolute intervals of that type in the scale. Note that this will always return exactly one interval for major scale and its modes.

public AbsoluteInterval GetAbsoluteInterval(RelativeInterval relativeInterval)
